name: Toothpick Crossbow·
description:
The ORIGINAL & BEST Toothpick Crossbow toy in your pocket!
-----
Bored or itching to get some target practice? Then download this fun toothpick crossbow toy to relax, relieve some stress, and just kill some time!

It's like a real Toothpick Crossbow, but even better!

Use your finger to tap to shoot the toothpick crossbow, and collect those sweet reward coins! Upgrade your crossbow for better reload time, compete with your friends, and beat the records!

Each shot brings you closer to unlocking a new toothpick crossbow.

Can you unlock them all?!
